name: Hell House
description:
A horror game developed in 3 days by ddg studio as a kind of challenge Android version :Click
  • Game story : You are trying to conduct a survival and quality process in an attempt to believe in escape and survival and trying to escape from the ghosts that inhabit, they will not leave you in peace ...

 

  • Control:
  • W/S/D/A TO  MOVE 
  • "E" TO USE THINGS
